long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We help you save your fave images.

- No more prompt worries.
- Train your own image styles.
- Recreate your fave images.

Once you will install chrome extension and visit any webpage, on every image (on mouse hover) you will see button to save it in scrapbook.gg

You can do the same by right-click on image - you will see new menu item "Save in Scrapbook"

Also you can just click extension button from browser extension menu and in modal window you will see list of all images (max 20 images) that is on current website. Its very helpful when you want to save images that is not directly accessible by mouse click. (like background image, overly, etc.)
